name: Pirates Bounty Spicy Mango Salad
author: SilverCord
summary: Cold mango and apple salad, with a hint of spiciness. Goes well as a side dish with chicken, seafood, or just the salad!
ingredients: 4 large mangos - peeled, pitted, and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
4 large apples - cored and cut into 1x1/4-inch matchsticks
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Mix mangos, apples, and onion together in a large bowl
Combine lime juice, cilantro, balsamic vinegar, and red pepper flakes in a jar with a lid; shake well
Pour the dressing over the mango salad; toss gently to coat
Season with salt and black pepper
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate salad for 30 minutes
Fold peanuts into the salad just before serving
